articles.headline: Federal Reserve signals potential rate cuts in Q2 2026, Bitcoin surges past $120k.
articles.summary: In a surprising turn, Jerome Powell alluded to a more dovish stance, citing cooling inflation metrics. The crypto market reacted instantly, with major assets posting double-digit gains.

articles.headline: Massive stablecoin outflow from exchanges to private wallets detected.
articles.summary: Over $2 billion in USDT and USDC has been moved off major centralized exchanges in the last 24 hours, suggesting accumulation by large entities in anticipation of a market move.

articles.headline: Project Leviathan v1.1 update: Real-time news aggregator module successfully deployed.
articles.summary: The Civil City platform has integrated a dynamic news fetching module, laying the groundwork for real-time, multi-source data streams. This marks a critical step in becoming a premier intelligence hub.

articles.headline: EU finalizing MiCA II framework, focusing on DeFi and decentralized identity.
articles.summary: European regulators are drafting the next phase of crypto-asset regulation. Sources indicate a strong focus on on-chain governance and self-custody solutions.
